rows.label: qev092402_MSG0001
rows.name: So about that thing...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092402_MSG0002
rows.name:
I plan to go ask around to all the folks she's
helped here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092402_MSG0003
rows.name:
Could you take a lap of the city and see what
info you can get?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092402_MSG0004
rows.name: If you find out anything, come meet me back here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092402_MSG0005
rows.name: How goes it? Any leads on that little project of ours?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092402_MSG0006
rows.name:
...Huh. Whale debris with a personal archive database
we haven't found yet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092402_MSG0007
rows.name:
Sounds promising.
I suppose I'll pin all my hopes on that, then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092402_MSG0008
rows.name:
I'll let Quentin know, have him sniff around
and see what he can find.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092402_MSG0009
rows.name: He's a bit of a whiner, that Quentin...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092402_MSG0010
rows.name: But apparently he's some kind of FrontierNav wizard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092402_MSG0011
rows.name:
I'm sure he'll track it down,
so why don't you drop in on him in a bit?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092402_MSG0012
rows.name: Er, what project is this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092402_MSG0013
rows.name: Are we supposed to be finding something? For someone? [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092402_MSG0014
rows.name:
Yeah, no. Just a thing.
Blah blah blah, details. No big whoop.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092402_MSG0015
rows.name:
Who cares, right? Forget the details
and just party all night! Woooo![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092402_JNK0010
rows.name: Lie

rows.label: qev092402_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Hope that it is a top-secret research report.

rows.label: qev092402_JNK0020
rows.name: Evade

rows.label: qev092402_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Hope that you also cannot wait to party all night.

rows.label: qev092402_MSG0016
rows.name: Something you can't even tell your team? Wow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092402_MSG0017
rows.name:
Well, I'll stop asking questions
and focus on getting the mission done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092402_MSG0018
rows.name: This research could improve life in New LA, so let's hurry![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092402_MSG0019
rows.name: Oh, come on. YOU'RE keeping secrets from me, too?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092402_MSG0020
rows.name: ...All right. I won't pry. I'll just try to help as best I can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092402_MSG0021
rows.name: If you don't want to tell me, I trust your judgment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092402_MSG0022
rows.name:
Then let's get back to it!
...Oh, and I've been asking around, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092402_MSG0023
rows.name: Check back in with me in a bit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092402_MSG0024
rows.name: Come back here after you give her the thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092402_MSG0025
rows.name: I won't be able to sleep until I've seen her smiling.[ST:wait ]
